item.title: Thurl Ravenscroft - You're A Mean One, Mr. Grinch - Key of Am - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song You're A Mean One, Mr. Grinch by Thurl Ravenscroft from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B7, C, D, Dm, Dm7, E7, F7, F♯dim, G.
